I love this top so much that I bought 2 other colors and play to buy more!  The sleeve length is long enough that my wrists don't show when I reach up and there are thumb holes at the wrists. This pink one is somewhat see-through, my white bra and black leggings are visible through the light color fabric.  I'll be ordering more of these just darker colors.
This is a flattering fit, great for layering. The quality is ok, it won’t last forever, but is great for a time. You can wear it alone or as a layer under sweaters or jackets. I’d buy again!

Finally, a cute shirt that fits perfect feels great and covers my booty in yoga pants! One day, I will have the perfect butt And won’t need to cover it, but until that day… this is my new favorite shirt.

I love this top.  So much I bought it in two other colors.  I bought white first, a bit see through but I wear it with a jacket most the time, the material is soft, comfortable and it is worth the price!

This was not for me.  I purchased it because I saw it looked great on an influencer.  Not so much on me.  The material was too thin and the material was clingy.  It was true to size but longer than I had thought. I could get away with it as a layer, but not by itself. I returned the item.

Firstly the shirt is really soft and the color (lake blue) is as pictured. However it is thinner than most t-shirts. The thumb holes are perfect for germaphobe’s like myself when opening public doors.  Now the con’s…  With the top being as thin as it is, it’s not going to keep me as warm as I had hoped for. I mean it will be nice for warm (70°-75°) fall nights in Texas but for someone who’s always cold like myself this one isn’t going to work. The listing does not mention anything about it being an oversized shirt and yes I seen how it looks on the model. However, we all know it’s hard to trust the photos when online shopping so we tend to size up. DON’T do it with this one lol. I am 5’4”, 175, and heavy up top so I ordered an XL. As soon as I pulled it out of the package I had to double check the size they sent me. This thing is freaking big and looks huge on me lol. It covers the booty like I wanted, covers the fupa like I wanted, but it also hangs to mid thigh lol. It has zero shape making me look even shorter and rounder. Seriously I could just add a belt wear as a dress or even wear it as a night shirt. All in all if you like the big and baggy look then this IS your top, but if you’re going for a more faltering look, order your normal size or maybe even try a size smaller lol. It may look good half tucked but I haven’t done that since the early 2000’s lol.
